name: Mobit
description: Mobit is a decentralized wallet interface on the Nervos Network (CKB) that connects to existing wallets to "easily and securely transfer assets between Bitcoin and CKB" using the RGB++ Leap protocol for a "seamless cross-chain experience." Built on CKBâ€™s secure Layer 1 and UTXO-based Cell model, Mobit integrates with the JoyID protocol to provide a passwordless, mnemonic-free experience for managing Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and CKB assets. Announced in July 2024, Mobit enhances cross-chain interoperability and DeFi interactions by leveraging RGB++ Leap for trustless, bridge-free asset transfers, acting as a wrapper to streamline asset management and trading within the Nervos ecosystem.

highlights.title: Seamless Cross-Chain Transfers
highlights.description: Enables easy and secure asset transfers between Bitcoin and CKB using RGB++ Leap, offering trustless, bridge-free cross-chain functionality

highlights.title: DeFi Accessibility
highlights.description: Simplifies DeFi participation by offering a user-friendly interface for cross-chain asset management and trading within the Nervos ecosystem

faq.a: Mobit is unique as a wallet interface that connects to existing wallets, enabling seamless, trustless asset transfers between Bitcoin and CKB via RGB++ Leap without traditional bridges. Its JoyID integration offers a passwordless experience, and it enhances DeFi accessibility for BTC, ETH, and CKB assets.

faq.q: How does RGB++ Leap work in Mobit?
faq.a: RGB++ Leap enables trustless cross-chain transfers by mapping Bitcoin UTXOs to CKB Cells via isomorphic binding, allowing secure, permissionless movement of assets (e.g., coins and NFTs) without traditional bridges.
